0.1.name: wordpress/wp-photonav
0.1.description:
This plugin is a rewrite of a JavaScript snippet called PhotoNav. It provides for easy integration of panaorama pictures in a Wordpress page throught using shortcode. The user can "rotate" the view of the panorama by moving the mouse over the image area or dragging the image. Additional features include an integration with jQuery Colorbox and animated scrolling.

Further reading:

  • Suitable panorama pictures can be created e.g. using the Hugin panorama photo stitcher
  • For usage examples and documentation, please visit the plugin page
  • If you are interested in contributing, feel free to fork on GitHub
